article_title: Your pictures on the theme of 'insects'
article_description: Each week  we publish a gallery of readers  pictures on a set theme  This week it is  insects
article_content: li Paul Granahan   While on holiday on Corfu  I went to a pond hopping to photograph kingfishers but ended up shooting insects  which were much more abundant li li Dave Stewart   I don t actually know what the insect is  I m assuming it s a moth  But i   1817 chars
